programme.title: Day 1 - M1 - ATP 500 Rio Open Presented By Claro - Rio de janeiro 2026
programme.desc: Played on outdoor clay at the Jockey Club Brasileiro, the Rio Open is South America’s flagship ATP event. A 32-player singles draw battles for 500 ATP points and a $2,469,450 USD prize pool, with heavy clay-court exchanges and an electric atmosphere defining one of the tour’s most distinctive stops.

programme.title: Saint-Raphael vs Nantes - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: EN Spirit of Sport Series 11 | E3

Ahead of the 2026 Winter Olympics in Milano Cortina, freestyle skier Eileen Gu reflects on her journey to gold. Cricket legend Sachin Tendulkar and tennis icon Novak Djokovic spotlight the transformative power of sport and how they’re using their platforms to give back. England Lioness Georgia Stanway visits a special football project in London to inspire the next generation.

programme.title: Brentford v. Arsenal - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Brentford’s first ever Premier League victory came against Arsenal, in their first game in the competition in August 2021. Since then, they’re winless in their last eight against the Gunners. Arsenal lost their first Premier League away game 2-0 against Brentford but have since won their last three by an aggregate score of 7-1.

programme.title: West Ham United v. Manchester United - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: West Ham have won each of their last three home league games against Manchester United, last having a longer run between 1974 and 1977. Manchester United have lost four of their last six Premier League games against West Ham, more than they had in their previous 28.

programme.title: Sunderland v. Liverpool - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Sunderland are winless in their last 11 Premier League games against Liverpool since a 1-0 home win in March 2012 thanks to a Nicklas Bendtner strike. programme.desc: Following their 1-0 win at Molineux in December, Nottingham Forest are looking to complete their first league double over Wolves since 2012-13, and first in the top-flight since 1980-81. programme.title: Sunderland vs Liverpool - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 26
programme.desc: Sunderland are winless in their last 11 Premier League games against Liverpool since a 1-0 home win in March 2012 thanks to a Nicklas Bendtner strike. programme.title: Brentford vs Arsenal - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 26

programme.title: Paris FC vs Lens - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 22
programme.desc: Paris FC have lost each of their last three matches against Lens in all competitions, after losing only one of their previous seven. programme.desc: Nantes are the side Monaco have beaten most often in all competitions under the Dmitri Rybolovlev era. Monaco have not lost any of their last 16 matches against Les Canaris. programme.title: Crystal Palace vs Burnley - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 26
programme.desc: Crystal Palace have won their last three Premier League games against Burnley by an aggregate score of 6-0. Burnley lost 3-0 in their last Premier League away game against Crystal Palace, last losing consecutive visits to Selhurst Park in January/December 2018.

programme.title: Rennes vs Paris Saint-Germain - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 22
programme.desc: Rennes are one of four teams to have beaten Paris SG as many as seven times during the QSI era, alongside Lyon, Monaco and Bayern Munich. Rennes have scored at least one goal in each of their last 10 home games against Paris SG in all competitions, netting 13 goals.

programme.title: Le Havre vs Toulouse - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 22

programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Football Legends - News
programme.desc: In the world of sports, few debates ignite passion and enthusiasm quite like the discussion surrounding the greatest football players of all time. This topic transcends generations, cultures, and nationalities, as fans passionately defend their favorites and recount unforgettable moments on the pitch. From legendary goal scorers to masterful playmakers, the players who have left an indelible mark on the game deserve recognition and celebration. " Football Legends" explore the remarkable careers and contributions of these iconic players who have shaped the beautiful game.

programme.title: Football Legends - News
programme.desc: In the world of sports, few debates ignite passion and enthusiasm quite like the discussion surrounding the greatest football players of all time. This topic transcends generations, cultures, and nationalities, as fans passionately defend their favorites and recount unforgettable moments on the pitch. From legendary goal scorers to masterful playmakers, the players who have left an indelible mark on the game deserve recognition and celebration. " Football Legends" explore the remarkable careers and contributions of these iconic players who have shaped the beautiful game.

programme.desc: Outdoor hard-court action comes to Delray Beach as the ATP Tour stages a key early-season title race from 16–22 February 2026.
